title: Playwright E2E + GitHub Actions
summary: Sharded Playwright on self-hosted runners with HTML summary, retries, and artifact uploads.

body.raw:
## Goal

Run fast, reliable E2E in CI with minimal flake.

## Approach

- Shard-aware Playwright config
- Retries + trace on-retry
- Upload HTML report to CI summary

## Results

- Runtime ↓ **40%**
- Flake ↓ **70%**
